segments.text: Well , we didn't ask for this room service.It must be somebody else's , I'm sure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , is it ? Let me check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to say that this room service charge is yours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We paid for the room service already in our room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we got no receipt , but we paid on the spot .
segments.speaker: S1
